pullRequest.title: Add checkNonNullAndSerializable util method
pullRequest.bodyText:
This combines Objects.requireNonNull with our Util.checkSerializable
into single method call. Useful in source/sink builders for checking
parameters.

 Tags Set

commit.message:
Add checkNonNullAndSerializable util method

This combines Objects.requireNonNull with our Util.checkSerializable
into single method call. Useful in source/sink builders for checking
parameters.

nodes.bodyText: We can add @Nonnull annotation for the method and @Nullable for object parameter.
requireNonNullAndSerializable would better match the standard Objects.requireNonNull. We can also use it inside the method...

commit.message: Add annotations, make checkSerializable return given object
Remove annotations, not clear what to use on object

nodes.bodyText: can we add Nullable / Nonnull annotations to these methods?
